org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.state

类 ImmutableValueState<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.state.ImmutableState
      • org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.state.ImmutableValueState<V>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    State, ValueState<V>

    @PublicEvolving
public final class ImmutableValueState<V>
extends ImmutableState
implements ValueState<V>
    A read-only ValueState that does not allow for modifications.

    This is the result returned when querying Flink's keyed state using the Queryable State Client and providing an ValueStateDescriptor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • value

        public V value()
        从接口复制的说明: ValueState
        Returns the current value for the state. When the state is not partitioned the returned value is the same for all inputs in a given operator instance. If state partitioning is applied, the value returned depends on the current operator input, as the operator maintains an independent state for each partition.

        If you didn't specify a default value when creating the ValueStateDescriptor this will return null when to value was previously set using ValueState.update(Object).

        指定者:
        value 在接口中 ValueState<V>
        返回:
        The state value corresponding to the current input.

      • update

        public void update(V newValue)
        从接口复制的说明: ValueState
        Updates the operator state accessible by ValueState.value() to the given value. The next time ValueState.value() is called (for the same state partition) the returned state will represent the updated value. When a partitioned state is updated with null, the state for the current key will be removed and the default value is returned on the next access.
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 ValueState<V>
        参数:
        newValue - The new value for the state.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        从接口复制的说明: State
        Removes the value mapped under the current key.
        指定者:
        clear 在接口中 State

                                              throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
